directions: Beat cream cheese and milk in large bowl with electric mixer until well blended. Add dry pudding mix and pineapple; mix well. Gently stir in 2 cups of the whipped topping; spoon into crust.
Top with coconut, strawberries and remaining whipped topping just before serving. Store leftovers in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 pkg. (4 serving size)  JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Instant Pudding & Pie Filling
1 (8 ounce) can DOLE Crushed Pineapple in Juice, undrained
1 (8 ounce) tub COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed, divided
1 (6 ounce) HONEY MAID Graham Pie Crust
1/4 cup BAKER'S ANGEL FLAKE Coconut, toasted
title: Strawberry Pina Colada Pie
